mapper.select: SELECT * FROM User where binary UserName=#{userName}
SELECT * FROM User where binary UserName=#{userName} and Password=#{password}
select User.* from Friend,User where binary Friend.UserName = #{userName} and User.UserName = Friend.FriendName
select headImg from User where binary UserName = #{userName}
select * from Msg where binary senderName = #{name1} and receiverName = #{name2} or senderName = #{name2} and receiverName = #{name1}
select count(*) from Msg where binary senderName = #{name1} and receiverName = #{name2} and isRead = false
select count(*) from Friend where UserName = #{userName} and FriendName = #{friendName}
mapper.update: update User set Password = #{password}, Sex = #{sex}, motto = #{motto}, birthday = #{birthday}, headImg = #{headImg} where binary UserName = #{userName}
update Msg set isRead = true where binary senderName = #{name1} and receiverName = #{name2} and isRead = false
update User set online = true where binary UserName = #{userName}
update User set online = false where binary UserName = #{userName}
mapper.insert: insert into User(userid, username, password, sex, motto, birthday, online, headimg) VALUES (#{userId},#{userName},#{password},#{sex},#{motto},#{birthday},#{online},#{headImg})
insert into Msg(senderName, receiverName, msg, img, time, msgType,isRead) VALUES (#{senderName},#{receiverName},#{msg},#{img},#{time},#{msgType},#{isRead})
mapper.delete: delete from Msg where senderName = #{senderName} and receiverName = #{receiverName}
delete from Friend where UserName = #{userName} and FriendName = #{friendName}
